snippet: In the final game of this N.C.A.A. tournament, Kentucky’s Anthony Davis was not much of a presence on the scoreboard, yet controlled the rest of the game with swats and blocking.
abstract: Kentucky’s Anthony Davis was not much of a presence on the scoreboard in the final game of the NCAA men's basketball tournament, yet he controlled the rest of the game with swats and blocking; Davis was named the outstanding player of the Final Four.
lead_paragraph: In the final game of this N.C.A.A. tournament, Kentucky’s Anthony Davis was not much of a presence on the scoreboard, yet controlled the rest of the game with swats and blocking.

headline.main: Wildcats’ Davis Dominates the Title Game With His Swats, Not His Shots
headline.print_headline: Wildcats’ Davis Dominates the Title Game With His Swats, Not His Shots
